snippet.title: 77p egg: Eggwife - Reveal Trailer 2!!!!
snippet.description:
After a sexual mishap, our hero 77p egg finds itself on a quest to find a new wife while the world is overrun by sentient sewage and a milk-obsessed cult.

Set in Sheffield, England, 77p egg: Eggwife is a first-person shooter inspired by the likes of Postal 2, Duke Nukem 3D, Goat Simulator, and a general tone of "good enough" during development; embracing the jankiness that comes with making your first game.

Follow development, help playtest, and shitpost with us on Discord: https://www.discord.io/77pStudios​

Uhhhh, Twitter or something:
https://twitter.com/77pStudios
